headline.main: Most Sicilian Art Objects Intact Despite Bombings and Vandalism; Principal Greek and Norman Treasures Saved -- Works of Renaissance Period Suffered -- Allies Guarding Relics

lead_paragraph: PALERMO, Sicily, Aug. 31 (Delayed) -- Most of the important art treasures of Sicily have escaped the devastation of war, an Allied official in charge of this matter revealed today. There has been, of course, a certain amount of destruction caused by bombs, which was inevitable, and a little is owing to the carelessness that soldiers must be expected to show.
abstract: bomb damage to Sicilian art reptd light
